title: AI's workforce impact is ‘small,' but it’s not ‘zero,’ economist says
description: It's no secret that the job market has stalled halfway through 2025, but experts say it's driven by economic uncertainty rather than artificial intelligence.
content:
BartekSzewczyk | Getty Images
While artificial intelligence has caused turbulence in the labor market, the recent decline in job opportunities has more to do with economic uncertainty, experts say.

title: Apple’s Plan B for AI Is Actually Pretty Great
description: The iPhone maker doesn’t have to sink billions of dollars into its own artificial intelligence when it can team up with a partner like Google.

title: Nation states are ‘weaponising AI and social media to target UK children’ in 'sophisticated' attacks
description: Nation states are increasingly using social media to target British children, exploiting personal data and artificial intelligence to influence and manipulate young users, LBC can reveal.
content:

title: Ian Ross: Police appeal for missing hillwalker who disappeared in Scottish Highlands a year ago
description: Drones and artificial intelligence (AI) have been used in the major search operation.
content:
Police have issued a fresh appeal in the search for a missing man who disappeared in the Scottish Highlands a year ago.
Ian Ross, 66, last spoke to his family on 6 September 2024.
